instruction: Fix the CronJob so it runs every night at 02:30 UTC, forbids concurrent runs, limits history jobs, and adds CPU/memory requests plus a ConfigMap volume for scripts.
original_code:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: nightly-cleanup
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
            - name: cleanup
              image: busybox:latest
              command:
                - sh
                - -c
                - echo cleaning
          restartPolicy: Never
